scripts.release: npm run build:web && npm run android:release
scripts.integrate:web: npm run -w @poc/web build && npx playwright test -c apps/web/playwright.config.js
scripts.integrate:ios: cd apps/mobile && npx detox build -c ios.sim.release -l error && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx detox test -c ios.sim.release -l error --artifacts-location ../../artifacts/detox/ios --record-logs failing --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing
scripts.integrate:android: cd apps/mobile && npx detox build -c android.emu.release -l error && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx detox test -c android.emu.release -l error --artifacts-location ../../artifacts/detox/android --record-logs failing --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing
scripts.integrate:all: npm run integrate:web && npm run integrate:ios && npm run integrate:android
